pullrequest.title: Adding WheelSlipPlugin: for adding wheel slip using ODE's contact parameters

content.raw:
I bumped the gazebo minor version number to help gazebo_ros_pkgs avoid build errors:

* https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/commit/11bdeba78aaefd4abdad121b08fbeb15f6541353
* https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/compare/kinetic-devel...scpeters:wheel_slip_plugin
